attributes.action: Release the boy from prison who recieved 26 weeks in prison for stealing a bottle of water during the riots
attributes.additional_details: Nicholas Robinson who was jailed for stealing a bottle of water during the riots, is unjust and excessive compared to MPs and shoplifters who have received much less sentences, this boys plea of guilty was not reflected in sentencing as the magistrate gave him the full sentence a magistrate can give. This boy needs to be released from prison.
